files.patch:
@@ -33,0 +33,4 @@ +# Collect hs_errs for build-time crashes, e.g. javac, jmod, jlink, CDS. +# These usually land in make/ +hs_err_files=$(ls make/hs_err*.log 2> /dev/null || true) + @@ -49,0 +53,12 @@ + for hs_err in $hs_err_files; do + echo "
View HotSpot error log: "$hs_err"" + echo '' + echo '```' + echo "$hs_err:" + echo '' + cat "$hs_err" + echo '```' + echo '
' + echo '' + fi + @@ -53,16 +69,0 @@ -# Collect hs_errs for build-time crashes, e.g. javac, jmod, jlink, CDS. -# These usually land in make/ -hs_err_files=$(ls make/hs_err*.log 2> /dev/null || true) - -for hs_err in $hs_err_files; do - echo "
View HotSpot error log: "$hs_err"" - echo '' - echo '```' - echo "$hs_err:" - echo '' - cat "$hs_err" - echo '```' - echo '
' - echo '' -done >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY - @@ -82,2 +82,0 @@ - -echo ':arrow_right: To see the entire build log, click the job in the list to the left.' >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY
